text: @GovRicketts Reslly the thought of eating meat infected by Covid-19 is yuck. To buy meat that workers are paying for with their lives is not an option. Tired of heartless gvmt, CEOs, GOP.  GOOD TIME TO GO VEGETARIAN. DONT EAT COVID.
